required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: What Are the Effects of Fibrinogen Concentrate Administration on Biological Parameters
clinical_study.official_title: What Are the Effects of Fibrinogen Concentrate Administration on Biological Parameters

brief_summary.textblock: the fibrinogen concentrate are given since 50 years with the dose of 2g for a afibrinogenemia. But this dose has been fixed 40 years ago and from now nobody discuss this quantity. Through this retrospective study the investigators tried to explore the evolution of blood test after a prescription of fibrinogen concentrate

detailed_description.textblock: the fibrinogen concentrate are given since 50 years with the dose of 2g for a afibrinogenemia. But this dose has been fixed 40 years ago and from now nobody discuss this quantity. Through this retrospective study the investigators tried to explore the evolution of blood test after a prescription of fibrinogen concentrate.

primary_outcome.description: Fibrinogen was measured before and after a fibrinogen factor transfusion. It will be used to calculate the delta (after - before) and mesure the efficiency of a transfusion
FIBTEM A5® was measured before and after a fibrinogen factor transfusion. It will be used to calculate the delta (after - before) and mesure the efficiency of a transfusion

study_pop.textblock: all patient who received fibrinogen concentrate

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- all patient who received fibrinogen concentrate
Exclusion Criteria:
- none
